UPDATE material AS m LEFT JOIN ( SELECT name, spec, SUM(CASE WHEN operation = '入库' THEN amount ELSE -amount END) AS stock, SUM(CASE WHEN operation = '出库' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS outbound FROM material_operation GROUP BY name, spec ) AS op ON m.name = op.name AND m.spec = op.spec SET m.amount = COALESCE(op.stock, NULL), m.outbound = COALESCE(op.outbound, NULL);
